angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And I have learnt so much about the history of the Roman Colosseum from his lecture.
sentences.chinese: 从今天这堂课上我就学到很多关于罗马角斗场的历史。

sentences.english: Achieved Vicious Gladiator title. Achieved Ruthle Gladiator title.
sentences.chinese: 获得头衔“暴蓝田墨玉怒角斗士”。

sentences.english: Pebbled leather gladiator sandals in black.
sentences.chinese: 鹅卵石皮革黑角斗士凉鞋。

sentences.english: Gladiator-inspired sandals are made of reptile-embossed synthetic leather.
sentences.chinese: 角斗士的灵感凉鞋的爬行动物压花合成革。

sentences.english: Carl was a collection of pupae, perfectly suited for gladiatorial combat.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔就是一群蛹的结合体，非常适合角斗。

sentences.english: It makes me think of contemporary gladiators.
sentences.chinese: 这让我想起历史上的角斗士。

sentences.english: The tickets for “Gladiator” have been sold out.
Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 钢锁与撞针于大角斗场结识威震天。

sentences.english: All in the hall were intensely fastening their eyes on the two fighters.
sentences.chinese: 东西双方的目光都集注于场中二人的角斗。

sentences.english: Before the fights came the 14)ritual salute to the Emperor. "Ave Caesare."
sentences.chinese: 在进行角斗前要先行仪式向皇帝致敬。

sentences.english: The second major event we encountered was the infamous gladiatorial boss.
sentences.chinese: 第二个主要事件是我们遭遇了传说中的角斗王。

sentences.english: Oslash; Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 钢锁与撞针于大角斗场结识威震天。

sentences.english: Gladiators fought with lions in the arena in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 在古罗马的角斗场上，角斗士与狮子搏斗。

sentences.english: Gladiators fought with lions in the arena in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 在古罗马的角斗场上，角斗士与狮子搏斗。

sentences.english: But what about genuine gladiatorial events?
sentences.chinese: 但历史上真实的角斗情况如何呢？
